title: Now I am an Australian
subject_group: Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Vietnamese - Australia
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Immigrants - Australia
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Memory
abstract: We had hopes of living in a free country.
description: An migrated with her family to Australia and settled in Richmond. She is actively involved in the Vietnamese community and works toward keeping Vietnamese culture and traditions alive. Made at ACMI as part of the 'Recovering Hope' Digital Storytelling project, in partnership with VicHealth and Belgium Street Neighbourhood House.
